source: Your movement break for your brain, body...
target: みんな、体とあたまを動かして

source: Yes, the sun's up. Let's have some fun on the beach, but first we fire it up. Let's get that body moving.
target: 太陽が出てきたね！！ビーチで遊ぶ前に、気合をいれるために体を動かそう！

source: Wow, it's an absolute scorcher out today, and the sand is like lava. Gotta be quick to get to that shade. To do that, we're gonna hop across the sand like this,
target: わあ、今日はとっても暑いね！すなわまるでマグマみたい！急いで日かげに行かなきゃ！すなの上をジャンプして、

source: and then when we get to the shade, we're gonna cool our feet off
target: 日かげになったら、足を冷やそうね！

source: and make sure they don't catch fire.
target: 足のやけどに注意して
準備はいい？レッツゴー！

source: Keep it up, we're almost to the shade.
target: 頑張って！もうすぐ日かげだよ！

source: You gotta keep them moving quickly. We don't wanna see any sparks.
target: ひばなが出ないように、足を速く動かしてね！

source: Okay, who's ready for the next bit of shade?
target: よし、次の日かげに行くよ！準備はいい？

source: It's gonna be a long one, let's go. Across that sand, here we go. Keep it up, remember, on the spot.
target: 砂の上でジャンプ！できるだけ同じ場所をキープしながら頑張ろう！

source: Almost there, we're starting to burn.
target: もうすぐだよ、ちょっと熱くなってきた！

source: Oh, you gotta keep those feet moving quickly.
I feel so much better. I know this is tiring, but this is what Fire it up is all about. Ready? Last bit of shade. We're almost there.
target: 疲れるけど！これが気合を入れる時間だよ！最後の日かげだ！もう少し！

source: We can have a nice jump in the ocean. All the way.
target: 終わったら、海にジャンプしよう！

source: And fast speed on the last one.
and by the looks of things, we still have our feet.
target: みんな、まだ足は無事だね！

source: Hee hee, I've still got mine.

We're definitely gonna need to have a cool off swim after all that hot sand. To do that, we're gonna stand side on and jump over the waves like this as they come. And then we're gonna switch and do the same thing on the other side. Ready? Let's go for that swim.
target: あつい砂の上にいた後は、冷たい海で泳がなきゃね！まず横向きになって、来る波をジャンプで飛び越えよう！そして、反対側も同じようにやるよ！準備はいい？泳ぎに行こう！

source: Excellent, guys. You gotta keep both knees as high as you can.
target: いい調子だよ！両ひざをできるだけ高く上げよう！

source: It's not as easy as it looks, is it?
Gonna have the perfect swim after this. Switch to the other side.
target: このあとに泳げるなんて最高だね！反対向き！

source: Here we go. All the way up.
Wow, the ocean's so blue today.
target: なんて素敵なうみの色！

source: So inviting. We're so lucky we can be here to have the perfect swim.
target: この海で泳げるなんて、ほんとうに最高だね。

source: And into the blue ocean we go.

target: やっぱり泳ぐのって最高！

source: There's so many beautiful fish swimming around. Let's see if we can get a closer look. To do that, we're gonna stand shoulders apart, hands in front of us, squat down and move the water around us just like this.
target: きれいな魚が、いーっぱい泳いでるね！もっと近くで見てみよう！足を肩幅に開いて、手は前に。しゃがんで、まわりの水をこんな風にかいで行くよ！

source: This is gonna be a tough one, so we gotta have strong legs.
target: 大変だけど、足の力を強くするチャンスだ！

source: Remember, this is fired up, so we don't give up.
target: 気合いを入れる時間だから諦めないで！

source: Okay, let's see what we can find.
It's got so many stings. That's a lionfish.
target: トゲがいっぱい、あれはミノカサゴだ！

source: Look at the colors on that one. That's a parrotfish.
target: 見てあの色！あれはブダイだ！
見て！あしいっぱいのたこちゃんだ
とても素敵な場所だね。

source: Good thing we can hold our breaths for this one.
target: ふう、息が続いて良かった。

source: And got a view all these.
Now it's time to focus it. Electrify that brain.
target: 頭のひらめき！スイッチ～、オン！

source: Purple squid is in the house.
target: むらさきイカが応援に来たよ！

source: All that swimming was so much fun. Now, let's paddle back to shore. To do that, we're going to lunge one foot forward and keep the other one behind. Hold on to your paddle. I'm going to row from side to side. Ready? Let's go.
target: 沢山泳いでとても楽しかったね。きしまではひざまずきながら、パドルを漕いで戻っていくよ。パドルを右、ひだり交互にこごう。準備はいい？行ってみよう！

source: All right, now we're in focus it.
So we've really got to balance on that front leg.
target: 前の足でしっかりバランスを取ってね！

source: And remember to keep your core tight because we don't want to fall into the water.
target: 水に落ちないように体幹にしっかり力を入れてね！！

source: We just did all that swimming. Now we want to paddle. We're also using two sides of that brain, so we've got to go from left to right each time.
target: たくさん泳いだ後は、今度はパドルを使うよ！左右の脳を使うために左から右に交互に漕ごう！

source: You guys are doing amazing. Each time in focus it,
target: みんな、すごい頑張ってるね！

source: we work so well as a team.
target: 素敵なチームプレイだね

source: Wow, we're really starting to catch the speed.
target: ドンドンスピードが出てきたね！！

source: Whoa, we're even riding a wave.
target: なみにも乗ってるよ！凄い！

source: Well done, guys. Keep up that paddling.
target: みんな、よく頑張ってるね

source: We're almost back to shore. You've got this, guys. From one side to the other.
target: もうすぐきしにつくよ！頑張って！ 左から右に交互に漕いで。

source: Well done! We made it! back to shore safe and sound.
target: とうちゃく！無事にきしについて良かった！
このビーチをきれいにするぞ！

source: Oh, no. There's so much plastic on the beach.
target: ペットボトルでビーチが汚れてる！

source: Let's do our bit and get cleaning.
Standing on one leg, we're going to reach with the opposite hand to pick up the trash and then switching sides to the other leg to pick up the next item.
target: じゃ、私みたいにカタ足でスクワットして反対の手でゴミを拾って、次は反対側の足を使ってゴミを拾うよ。

source: Here we go. Starting to balance on that leg, reaching for the trash every single time.
target: 片足でバランスをとりながら、一つずつゴミを拾っていくよ。

source: Now, this is quite tricky, so if you fall out of it, don't worry. Just get right back into it.
target: 難しいから、もしバランスを崩しても心配しないで。すぐにまた挑戦しよう！

source: Oh, my gosh. There's so many plastic bottles
target: ペットボトルがこんなに捨てられてるなんて、
おまけにプラスチックの袋も！

source: Now, remember, each time you see trash on the beach, we pick it up
target: ビーチでゴミを見つけたら、ひろって

source: Thank you, guys, so much for helping.
target: 手伝ってくれてありがとう！

source: Well done, everybody. Staying balanced on that leg.
target: 片足でバランスをとりながら頑張ったね！

source: This is focus set. So we're using that body and that brain all together.
target: 集中するために、体とあたまを一緒に使っていくよ！

source: You guys got it! Got less than ten seconds on the clock.
target: みんな、がんばって！！あと10秒だよ！

source: There's some strange things on the beach.
wow. A message in a bottle.
target: ビンの中にメッセージが入ってるよ！

source: And the last one. Here it goes.
Yes. Well done, team. The beach looks so clean. Thank you.
target: よくやったね、みんな！ビーチがとてもきれいになったよ。ありがとう！

source: After all that cleaning, let's have some fun. Time for beach bats. To do that, we're going to hold on to our bat, hit too high, and then squat down to hit too low. All right.
target: 掃除を頑張ったから、ビーチバットで楽しもう！！！！バットを使って高いところで二回うつ、次はひざを曲げて低いところで二回うつよ

source: Alright. Who's ready to become a beach bat boss? Here we go.
target: 準備はいいかな？行くよ！
2回高いところ、そして二回低いところ！

source: We're trying to get every single ball.
target: ボールを落とさないようにしてね！

source: Squatting down when we go low.
target: 低いところはひざを曲げて！

source: Good job, team. We're doing such a great job.
So we're going in all sorts of directions.
Also, hold on to that bat. We don't want it to fly away.
target: みんな、バットを落とさないように、しっかり持ってね！

source: That's it, guys. We're almost there.
target: いい調子だよ！あと少し！

source: Beach bada bada, beach bada bada... Almost the end!
target: ビーチ バダ バダビーチ バダ バダ頑張って！

source: Incredible job, team. Now it's time to cool.
target: 良くやった！今はクールダウンの時間だよ

source: We're gonna take some deep breaths.
calm our heart and get ready for what's next.
Next up, we're going to sit crisscross like
put our hands together and squeeze them as hard as you can.
target: 手をギュッと合わせて、強く握ってみよう！
大きくギュッと握って

source: It feels so good to cool down.
target: クールダウンの時間はいいね！

source: Remember to sit as straight as you can
target: ねこぜにならないように

source: We don't want any floppy noodles.
and relax. Remember, you could use this any time
target: ゆるめて。ストレスを感じたときや、

source: when you're feeling stressed or a bit overwhelmed,
target: 胸がいっぱいになったときにしてみてね。

source: You don't need a lot of space, so you can do it anywhere.
target: 狭くてもできるからいつでもできるね

source: For the last exercise, we're going to do a figure of eight breathing. So imagine you have a big figure of eight in front of you, and we're going to start in the middle,
target: 最後のエクササイズは、８の字呼吸をやるよ！目の前に大きな８の字を描いてね、真ん中から始めよう！

source: breathe in on the one side,
and as we get to the middle,
breathe out on the other side.
Remember, everyone does this at a different pace,
target: みんなペースが違うから、

source: so it's okay to keep your own.
definitely requires a little bit of concentrating.
target: みんな集中して頑張ろう。

source: Everyone did such a great job during this adventure. Take some time to soak it in.
target: みんな今回の冒険もすごく頑張ったね！ゆっくり休んでね！

source: Thanks for joining us! See you next time!
target: 参加してくれてありがとう！またね！！！
